sesp-desc: Adds some extra special properties to all pages
sesp-property-page-id-desc: "$1" identifies the MediaWiki ID of a page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-page-len-desc: "$1" identifies the length of a page in bytes and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-rev-desc: "$1" identifies the revision ID of a page that has been approved and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-by-desc: "$1" identifies the user who set the approval status of the page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-date-desc: "$1" identifies the time when the approval status of the page was set and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-approved-status-desc: "$1" identifies the approval status of a page and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-block-desc: "$1" provides a list of blocks applied to a user and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-right-desc: "$1" provides a list of rights applied to a user and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-property-user-group-desc: "$1" provides a list of groups applied to a user and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Extra_Special_Properties Semantic Extra Special Properties] extension.
sesp-admin-deprecation-notice-title-repl: The following section contains settings that were renamed or otherwise modified and it is recommended to forthwith update their name or format.
